name: Box Jump (Tek Dot Vis)
description:
Box Jump is a new platformer with a twist!

Scattered throughout the levels are item boxes, which give you a different effect depending on how much time remains! (The jam's limitation made me improvise.)

These boxes can help or hinder your ability to platform your way to the Purple Exit Door!

But take your chances! Kill enemies, use item boxes, and collect coins!

Made for Mini Jam 95.
